actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from 60 percent to 90 percent the percentage of tuition and fees for an approved program of flight training which is paid by the Veteran's Administration under the GI bill educational assistance program.

summary.text: Amends the Veterans' Rehabilitation and Education Amendments of 1980 to increase from 60 to 90 the percentage of tuition and fees for an approved program of flight training which is paid by the Veterans' Administration under the GI bill education assistance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from 60 percent to 90 percent the percentage of tuition and fees for an approved program of flight training which is paid by the Veteran's Administration under the GI bill educational assistance program.
